Get ready for endless amounts of spin bots, aim bots, wall hacks and every possible plague on the Earth if you play on official server. Since the game became free casual playing is absolutely impossible, would not reccomend playing at all untill this is fixed - which it wont. Makes me sad I actually bought this game it is unplayable but I guess if you will be hacking go ahead noone will stop you.

Забанил патруль ни за что (прострел дефолтных позицый это норм да и было 2-3 раза в пару катках) а ток игра не плохая ток читеров дохуя и патруль дно
играть стало невозможно много читеров и смурфов например я не могу дальше развиваться в этой игре, игру не советую производитель на неё забили .
其实游戏本身还行，就是外挂太多了，这游戏迟早毁在外挂上

Overall the games great, however in time the long line of hackers, angry toxic players and overall bad energy from various individuals makes this game a bit harder to play if you're just starting out. So if you're sensitive to people screaming at you in Russian. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS GAME. However, if you can get about three of more friends to play with you at once you could have some fun while getting the occasional kill here or there.
